topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 2.0: Installing Required Patches for the Denver Deployment

body.p: All patch files can be downloaded from the Helion Distribution Network (HDN). You must obtain a user account on HDN in order to download these files.
body.section:
Deploy the Horizon Provider Network Patch
Because of a configuration issue with the Ansible roles, the Provider Networks tab in the Horizon interface will be hidden unless you deploy the following patch. You should have downloaded the following patch file during the prerequisites:
providernet-tab-missing-in-horizon.patch
The README with the patch download contains information on files changed by these patches.
To prevent this condition, execute the following commands:
Copy the patch file to ~/ on the lifecycle manager.
Change to the kenobi-node-configuration directory:cd ~/kenobi-node-configuration
Execute the following command to install the second patch patch -p1 < providernet-tab-missing-in-horizon.patch
Change to the ~/cg-hlm/hlm-build directory cd ~/cg-hlm/hlm-build
Execute the following command to integrate the changes into the environment:./hlm_prepare-env.shWhen you execute the hlm generate command is executed, the changes will be included.

Deploy the Horizon Switcher PatchThis patch must be applied only after the HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade is fully deployed.
horizon-region-switcher.patch
To deploy the patch:
Copy the patch file to ~/ on the lifecycle manager.
Change to the kenobi-node-configuration directory:cd ~/kenobi-node-configuration
Execute the following command to install the patch patch -p1 < ../horizon-region-switcher.patch
Change to the ~/cg-hlm/hlm-build directory cd ~/cg-hlm/hlm-build
Execute the following command to integrate the changes into the environment:./hlm_prepare-env.shWhen you execute the hlm generate command is executed, the changes will be included.
